## Loading the data


```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```
```{r}
?group_by
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```
##Tidying Data

```{r}
democratic_cmte <- committees%>%
  group_by(cmte_city)%>%
  filter(cmte_party_affiliation == "DEM")%>%
  select( cmte_name, cmte_dsgn, cmte_city, cmte_state, connected_org_name)

republician_cmte <- committees%>%
  group_by(cmte_city)%>%
  filter(cmte_party_affiliation == "REP")%>%
  select( cmte_name, cmte_dsgn, cmte_city, cmte_state, connected_org_name)

TeaParty <- committees%>%
  filter(cmte_party_affiliation == "TEA")%>%
  select( cmte_name, cmte_dsgn, cmte_city, cmte_state, connected_org_name)
```
